temperatureHigh.title: Temperature High Alarm
temperatureHigh.description: Indicates if the temperature exceeded the high threshold

temperatureLow.title: Temperature Low Alarm
temperatureLow.description: Indicates if the temperature dropped below the low threshold

humidityHigh.title: Humidity High Alarm
humidityHigh.description: Indicates if the humidity exceeded the high threshold

humidityLow.title: Humidity Low Alarm
humidityLow.description: Indicates if the humidity dropped below the low threshold

motionGuard.title: Motion Guard Alarm
motionGuard.description: Indicates if motion guard was triggered
